MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH14 postcode area of Edinburgh. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2.55pm due to a safety issue on the underground cable network and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.56pm on Monday 1st March 2021.
